DOC.brief_summary: Women overweight exercise high risk breast cancer menopause . This study test new electronic device measure body 's movement work alongside website help woman increase physical activity level . If effective , system could test large study aim reduce breast cancer risk reduce prevent obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Using Technology Improve Physical Activity Levels Among Postmenopausal Women ( The Active & Aware Study )
DOC.criteria: Female Postmenopausal BMI > = 25.0 kg/m2 Physically inactive Internet user regular access highspeed internet Willing able complete study requirement History invasive breast cancer Medical contraindication exercise Medical problem issue would interfere intervention Current participation another physical activity study
